casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Willie James LANGLEY 221P17-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. July 6, 2017 John Keating Wiles, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, for Langley, Willie James. Kimberly N. Callahan, Assistant Attorney General, Kimberly S. Robb, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 6th of July 2017 by State of NC for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 6th of July 2017."
